direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve transfer history but for different types of accounts (spot vs. futures).
Both methods access and retrieve historical data related to account transactions.
Both methods have similar structures for handling historical data retrieval with optional parameters.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the RequestHandler for API requests.
Environment setup is required before making API requests for transfer history.
Both methods verify and handle transfer history data, making them suitable for assertions.
